text: Perfecto "Jun" Rivas Yasay Jr. (January 27, 1947 - June 12, 2020) was a Filipino politician. He was Secretary of Foreign Affairs of the Philippines from June 30, 2016 until March 8, 2017. He was a member of the Bangon Pilipinas. He was born in Kidapawan, Philippines. He was Chairman of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) from 1995 to 2000 and was Bangon Pilipinas Party's vice-presidential candidate in the 2010 Philippine elections, running alongside Eddie Villanueva. Yasay Jr. died on June 12, 2020 in Manila from pneumonia caused by lung cancer, aged 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Filipino politicians Category:Soccsksargen
title: Perfecto Yasay Jr.
